original_title: Tentazioni Perverse di una Coppia Perbene
overview: It is told of a couple in crisis, with a wife who feels neglected by her husband always on a business trip, and who thinks that he no longer loves her, on the contrary the spouse thinks that she no longer loves him and tries to revive the wedding with the help of a friendly couple.
title: Perverse Temptations of a Good Couple
